nodes.text: Tregga was a smuggler who worked as part of an underworld crew led by Roa on Nar Shaddaa during the Imperial Period. In that time Tregga worked alongside fellow smugglers Vonzel and the twins Lozira and Rewinda Briil, and eventually, partners Han Solo and Chewbacca, who went on to great fame as Rebel heroes. At some point before 2 BBY, however, Tregga was captured while carrying a load of illegal chak-root, and was sentenced to a life sentence of hard labor at a penal colony on Akrit'tar.

Tregga was first mentioned in Han Solo's Revenge, a novel written by Brian Daley and released in 1979. Nearly 40 years later, a background character in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story was identified as Tregga by Pablo Hidalgo in Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide.
